name.baseName: Waste PS/ABS ; Recycled plastic particles ; Granulation ; All sizes; NESPS2
废PS/ABS ; 再生塑料粒子 ; 造粒 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/
technology.technologicalApplicability: 废PS/ABS塑料粒子造粒工业流程服务于回收行业，将废PS/ABS转变为可重新进入生产循环的再生塑料颗粒。这一再利用流程符合循环经济原则，并适用于所有规模的操作。末端处理技术，包括多级催化配合油水分离、生物膜吸附配合除雾和活性炭吸附、单独的活性炭吸附、低温等离子体、光催化和光解，用于处理造粒过程中挥发性有机化合物（VOCs）的排放，确保符合环境法规。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码42,四级代码4220文件，在完整版文件中第2473页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 源文件中描述为为再生塑料粒子，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisBiofilm absorption + demisting + activated carbon adsorption，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management80
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是生物膜吸收+除雾+活性炭吸附，其效率为80，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设备运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisMulti-stage catalysis + oil-water separation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management80，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment equipment (kWh) / equipment rated power (kW) / equipment operating time (hours)
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是多级催化+油水分离，其效率为80，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设备运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisActivated carbon adsorption，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management55
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是活性炭吸附，其效率为55，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设备运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisLow temperature plasma，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management50，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment equipment (kWh) / equipment rated power (kW) / equipment operating time (hours)
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是低温等离子体，其效率为50，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设备运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisPhotocatalysis，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management40，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment equipment (kWh) / equipment rated power (kW) / equipment operating time (hours)
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是光催化，其效率为40，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设备运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisPhotolysis，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management40，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment equipment (kWh) / equipment rated power (kW) / equipment operating time (hours)
